titles.title: Social Determinants for Moms Act of 2020
Social Determinants for Moms Act of 2020
Social Determinants for Moms Act of 2020
To address social determinants of health for women in the prenatal and postpartum periods, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Agriculture, Transportation and Infrastructure, and Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
